mutants.code:
def calculate_sum_of_subsets(N, P):
    MOD = 1000000008
    sum_value = 1
    p_value = 1
    for j in range(0, P):
        p_value = p_value * (N - j) // (j + 1)
        sum_value += p_value
    return sum_value % MOD
